title: Bug 132103: No objects under Context in palette when scripting a data set
SR:
Bug 132103: No objects under Context in palette when scripting a data set
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new data set and select it
2. Switch to script view
3. Choose 'onFetch' and open the palette

Expected result:
Objects 'this', 'row', and 'reportContext' should be available under the 'Context' section in the palette.

Other objects should also be available for other methods (e.g. ...)
